name: Night Keeper (ScorbunnySquad)
description:
You are a guard for the Van Leifen castle protects the family’s sacred treasure. However, the evil wizard Nilrem has manipulated the rats into attacking the treasures! Save the treasures at all costs or risk being fired!

An entry for NUS GDG's 24hr Game Jam: GameCraft 2019.

‘A’ button

Moves character to the left.

‘D’ button

Moves character to the right.

Left Click + Swipe RIGHT

Pushes the treasure to the RIGHT to set it back upright.

Example:

To push the treasure to the RIGHT, player has to be on the LEFT of the treasure to push it to the right.

Left Click + Swipe LEFT

Pushes the treasure to the LEFT to set it back upright.

Example:

To push the treasure to the LEFT, player has to be on the RIGHT of the treasure to push it to the right.
